THE-DOTS

ANALOG JOURNEYS

A TRAVEL PHOTOGRAPHY SITE

Analog Journeys is a collection of film photographs taken across the globe, reflecting emotions and experiences there; a travel log, a chronicle of the migrant experience, a view through the lens of a foreigner both at home and away. One year after the Maidan Revolution, I travelled home to Ukraine and spent a month documenting my homeland. Originally intended to be a photobook, the project outgrew this format when I decided to extend it beyond Ukraineâ€™s borders.

Date:04/2020
Roles:Photography, design, development, art direction.

The site provides an uncluttered platform where images do the talking. Alongside keyboard navigation within the gallery, it features a light mode for a more flexible viewing experience, allowing the photographs to be viewed in their best light.

Stay Classy

Alisya Couture
